message: Hello Bob, I am pleased to offer you this exceptional product. Given its unique value proposition, I believe a starting price of $1,300,000 is fair. This is a unique opportunity to acquire something truly special.
I'm very interested in the product, but $1,300,000 is a bit above my budget. I'm willing to pay $1,100,000 for it. I believe this is a fair price considering the product's value to me.

Bob, I appreciate your interest and offer. I'm confident this product will exceed your expectations in value. However, to be fair to both of us, I can't let it go for less than $1,225,000. This is a significant reduction on my part, and I believe it represents a fair compromise.

I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but $1,225,000 is still a bit out of my budget. I'm willing to pay $1,075,000 for the product. I believe this is a fair price considering the value it will bring to me.

Bob, I'm sensing we're getting closer to a deal that works for both of us. I'm willing to come down to $1,175,000. This is a significant concession on my initial price, reflecting my desire to see this valuable product in your hands.

I appreciate your continued willingness to negotiate. I'm willing to meet you halfway between $1,075,000 and $1,175,000, which is $1,125,000. I believe this is a fair price considering the product's value to me.
